name: apc_cache_info
purpose: Retrieves cached information from APC's data store

return.description:
Array of cached data (and meta-data) or FALSE on failureapc_cache_info will raise a warning if it is unable to
    retrieve APC cache data. This typically occurs when APC is not enabled.

changelog.change:
The "filehits" option for the
        cache_type parameter was introduced.
